trans-unit.source: In other words, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Compare%2A> method determines whether two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects represent a single point in time.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Compare%2A>方法判斷兩個<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件代表單一點的時間。

trans-unit.source: It directly compares neither dates and times nor offsets.
trans-unit.target: 它會直接比較的日期和時間都位移。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates calls to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Compare%2A> method to compare <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Compare%2A>方法來比較<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object to a specified <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object and indicates whether the current object is earlier than, the same as, or later than the second <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件與指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件進行比較，並指示目前物件是早於、等於還是晚於第二個 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A signed integer that indicates the relationship between the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object and <paramref name="other" />, as the following table shows.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的整數，表示目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件和 <paramref name="other" /> 之間的關係，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Return Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 傳回值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term>小於零

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object is earlier than <paramref name="other" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description>目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件早於 <paramref name="other" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 零

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object is the same as <paramref name="other" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description>目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件與 <paramref name="other" /> 相同。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term>大於零。

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object is later than <paramref name="other" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description>目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件晚於 <paramref name="other" />。

trans-unit.source: This method compares <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects by comparing their <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcDateTime%2A> values; that is, it determines whether the two objects represent a single point in time, and indicates whether the current object is earlier than, later than, or the same as the `other` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會比較<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件藉由比較其<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcDateTime%2A>值; 也就是說，它會判斷兩個物件是否代表的時間，單一的點，以及指出目前的物件是否早於、 晚，或與其相同`other`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates calls to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.CompareTo%2A> method to compare <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.CompareTo%2A>方法來比較<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that represents the date component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值，這個值表示目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的日期元件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that represents the date component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值，這個值表示目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的日期元件。

trans-unit.source: This property removes any significant part of the time component from a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object and returns only its significant date component.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性中移除的時間元件從任何重要的部分<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件，並只會傳回其重要日期元件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object has a date and time value of "1/12/07 4:01pm +7:30", the property returns a <xref:System.DateTime> value of "1/12/07 12:00:00 AM".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件的日期和時間值為"1/12/07 4:01 pm + 7:30"，屬性會傳回<xref:System.DateTime>值"1/12/07 12:00:00 AM"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value can then be displayed by using any of the standard or custom format specifiers that display dates only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>然後可以使用任何標準或自訂格式規範顯示日期的顯示值。

trans-unit.source: (See the Example section for an illustration.)
trans-unit.target: （請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。）

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is always <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件永遠是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: It is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值不會影響它<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To display a date without its time component, you can also use the "D" or "d" format specifiers; for an illustration, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示日期，但沒有時間元件，您也可以使用"D"或者"d"格式規範。如需圖例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Date%2A> property for a specific date.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取的值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Date%2A>特定日期的屬性。

trans-unit.source: It then displays that value to the console using some standard and custom date-only format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會顯示該值到主控台中使用某些日期標準和自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that represents the date and time of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值，這個值表示目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The date and time of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime%2A>屬性的值不受影響<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property returns both the date and the time component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object, which makes it useful for performing <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> to <xref:System.DateTime> conversion.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回日期和時間元件的<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件，使它適用於執行<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>至<xref:System.DateTime>轉換。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object has a date and time value of "1/12/07 4:01pm + 7:30", the property returns a date of "1/12/07 4:01pm".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件的日期和時間值為"1/12/07 4:01 pm + 7:30"，屬性會傳回日期的"1/12/07 4:01 pm"。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime%2A> property to convert the time returned by the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A> and <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcNow%2A> properties to <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime%2A>屬性，將所傳回的時間轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A>和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcNow%2A>屬性<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the day of the month represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得由目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件所表示之月份中的第幾天。

trans-unit.source: The day component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as a value between 1 and 31.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的天數元件，以 1 到 31 之間的數值表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Day%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Day%2A>屬性的值不受影響<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's day component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "d" or "dd" custom format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立的字串表示法<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>藉由呼叫物件的日期元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>具有"d"或"dd"自訂格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the day component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object in three different ways:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的日期元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件三種不同的方式：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Day%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所擷取的值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Day%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "d" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>使用"d"格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "dd" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>以"dd"格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the day of the week represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得由目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件所表示的星期幾。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the day of the week of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一個列舉值，表示目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的星期幾。

trans-unit.source: The value of the constants in the <xref:System.DayOfWeek> enumeration ranges from <xref:System.DayOfWeek.Sunday?displayProperty=nameWithType> to <xref:System.DayOfWeek.Saturday?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 中的常數的值<xref:System.DayOfWeek>列舉型別的範圍從<xref:System.DayOfWeek.Sunday?displayProperty=nameWithType>至<xref:System.DayOfWeek.Saturday?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If cast to an integer, its value ranges from zero (which indicates <xref:System.DayOfWeek.Sunday?displayProperty=nameWithType>) to six (which indicates <xref:System.DayOfWeek.Saturday?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成整數，其值範圍從零 (表示<xref:System.DayOfWeek.Sunday?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 為六個 (表示<xref:System.DayOfWeek.Saturday?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: You can also display the weekday name of a particular date by using the "D" format specifier or the "dddd" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用"D"格式規範或"dddd"自訂格式規範來顯示特定日期的週間日名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: Note that the string returned by calling the `ToString` method of the <xref:System.DayOfWeek> enumeration member that is returned by this property is not localized.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，字串會傳回透過呼叫`ToString`方法<xref:System.DayOfWeek>列舉的成員，這個屬性就會傳回未當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: To extract a string that contains the weekday name of the current culture or of a specific culture, call the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "dddd" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取字串，包含目前文化特性或特定文化特性的工作日名稱，請呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>以"dddd"自訂格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code displays the weekday name for a date using the `fr-fr` culture.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列程式碼會顯示日期，使用的工作日名稱`fr-fr`文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the weekday name of the first day of each month of the year 2008.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示 2008 年的每個月的第一天的工作日名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the day of the year represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得由目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件所表示之一年中的第幾天。

trans-unit.source: The day of the year of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as a value between 1 and 366.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件之一年中的第幾天，以 1 到 366 之間的數值表示。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> objects are equal, or a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件是相等，還是 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object represents the same point in time as a specified <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件與指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件是否代表相同的時間點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> objects have the same <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcDateTime" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcDateTime" /> 值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Before it performs the comparison, this method converts the values of both <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法在執行比較之前，將兩者的值轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The method is equivalent to the following:
trans-unit.target: 此方法相當於下列：

trans-unit.source: In other words, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%29> method determines whether two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects represent a single point in time.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%29>方法判斷兩個<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件代表單一點的時間。

trans-unit.source: It directly compares neither dates and times nor offsets.
trans-unit.target: 它會直接比較的日期和時間都位移。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects represent the same time and have the same offset value, use the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否有兩個<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件代表相同的時間，與具有相同的位移的值，使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object that is not `null` is considered to be later (or greater) than one that is `null`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>不是物件`null`會被視為更新版本 （或以上） 是比`null`。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%29> method implements the <xref:System.IEquatable%601.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%29>方法實作<xref:System.IEquatable%601.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It offers slightly better performance than the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload because the `other` parameter does not have to be converted from an object.
trans-unit.target: 它提供更好的效能比<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載，因為`other`參數不必從物件轉換。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates calls to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%29> method to test <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects for equality with the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%29>方法來測試<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件是否相等，與目前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件進行比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object represents the same point in time as a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件與指定的物件是否代表相同的時間點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter is a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object and represents the same point in time as the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 參數為 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件且與目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件代表相同的時間點，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Before it performs the comparison, this method converts the values of both the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object and the `obj` parameter to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法在執行比較之前，請將這兩個在目前的值轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件和`obj`參數以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The method is equivalent to the following:
trans-unit.target: 此方法相當於下列：

trans-unit.source: In other words, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method determines whether the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object and a specified object represent a single point in time.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會判斷是否目前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件和指定的物件代表單一點的時間。

trans-unit.source: It directly compares neither dates and times nor offsets.
trans-unit.target: 它會直接比較的日期和時間都位移。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects represent the same time and have the same offset value, use the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否有兩個<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件代表相同的時間，與具有相同的位移的值，使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If `obj` is `null`, or if the run-time type of `obj` is not <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`obj`是`null`，或執行階段類型，是否`obj`不<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>，方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example indicates whether the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is equal to several other <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects, as well as to a null reference and a <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例指出是否目前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件是否等於其他幾個<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件，以及以 null 參考，並為<xref:System.DateTime>物件。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個物件。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two specified <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> objects represent the same point in time.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件是否代表相同的時間點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> objects have the same <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcDateTime" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcDateTime" /> 值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Before it performs the comparison, this method converts both <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 在執行比較之前，此方法會將兩者<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The method is equivalent to the following:
trans-unit.target: 此方法相當於下列：

trans-unit.source: In other words, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29> method determines whether the two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects represent a single point in time.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29>方法會判斷是否這兩個<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件代表單一點的時間。

trans-unit.source: It directly compares neither dates and times nor offsets.
trans-unit.target: 它會直接比較的日期和時間都位移。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects represent the same time and have the same offset value, use the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否有兩個<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件代表相同的時間，與具有相同的位移的值，使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates calls to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29> method to test various pairs of <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29>方法來測試的各種組<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件進行比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object represents the same time and has the same offset as a specified <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件與指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件是否代表相同的時間且具有相同的位移。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object and <paramref name="other" /> have the same date and time value and the same <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件與 <paramref name="other" /> 具有相同的日期和時間值以及相同的 <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset" /> 值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because multiple time zones share a single offset, a return value of `true` does not guarantee that the current and the `other` object represent times in the same time zone.
trans-unit.target: 因為多個時區共用的傳回值的位移`true`不保證目前和`other`物件代表相同的時區時間。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A> method, the overloads of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%2A> method determine only whether two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values represent a single point in time.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法中，多載<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%2A>方法判斷只在兩個是否<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值代表單一點的時間。

trans-unit.source: They do not indicate that two values have the same date and time as well as the same offset.
trans-unit.target: 它們並不表示兩個值都有相同的日期和時間，以及相同的位移。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A> method to compare similar <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法來比較類似<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: A Windows file time, expressed in ticks.
trans-unit.target: Windows 檔案時間，以刻度表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Windows file time to an equivalent local time.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 Windows 檔案時間轉換成相等的本地時間。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the date and time of <paramref name="fileTime" /> with the offset set to the local time offset.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示位移已經設定為本地時間位移之 <paramref name="fileTime" /> 的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Windows 檔案時間是 64 位元值，表示 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file.
trans-unit.target: Windows 用來記錄應用程式建立、 存取，或寫入檔案時的檔案時間。

trans-unit.source: A Windows file time is directly accessible through the Windows API by calling the `GetFileTime` function, which returns a `FILETIME` structure.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫是透過 Windows API 直接存取 Windows 檔案時間`GetFileTime`函式，以傳回`FILETIME`結構。

trans-unit.source: The single function parameter is the handle of the file whose file time information is to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 單一函式參數是要擷取其檔案時間資訊的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The file handle is retrieved by calling the `CreateFile` function.
trans-unit.target: 檔案控制代碼會擷取藉由呼叫`CreateFile`函式。

trans-unit.source: The `FILETIME` structure's `dwHighDateTime` member contains the four high-order bytes of the file time, and its `dwLowDateTime` member contains the four low-order bytes.
trans-unit.target: `FILETIME`結構的`dwHighDateTime`成員包含四個高序位位元組的檔案時間，並將其`dwLowDateTime`成員包含四個低序位位元組。

trans-unit.source: The example that follows illustrates how to retrieve Windows file time values and convert them to <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將說明如何擷取 Windows 檔案時間值，並將它們轉換成<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值。

trans-unit.source: Windows file time values can also be created from <xref:System.DateTime> values by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTimeUtc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods, and from <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToFileTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Windows 檔案時間值也可以建立從<xref:System.DateTime>值藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTimeUtc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以及從<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToFileTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the Windows API to retrieve the Windows file times for the WordPad executable.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用 Windows API 來擷取 WordPad 可執行檔的 Windows 檔案時間。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filetime" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filetime" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="filetime" /> is greater than <see langword="DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filetime" /> 大於 <see langword="DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks" />。

trans-unit.source: A Unix time, expressed as the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z (January 1, 1970, at 12:00 AM UTC).
trans-unit.target: 自 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z (1970 年 1 月 1 日上午 12:00 UTC) 以來所經過的 Unix 時間 (以毫秒數表示)。

trans-unit.source: For Unix times before this date, its value is negative.
trans-unit.target: 若是在此日期之前的 Unix 時間點，其值為負數。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Unix time expressed as the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z to a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 將自 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z 以來所經過的 Unix 時間 (以毫秒數表示)，轉換成 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A date and time value that represents the same moment in time as the Unix time.
trans-unit.target: 表示與 Unix 時間相同時間點的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property value of the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> instance is <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which represents Coordinated Universal Time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>傳回之屬性值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>執行個體是<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>，代表國際標準時間。

trans-unit.source: You can convert it to the time in a specific time zone by calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將它轉換為特定時區的時間，藉由呼叫<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="milliseconds" /> is less than -62,135,596,800,000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="milliseconds" /> 小於 -62,135,596,800,000。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="milliseconds" /> is greater than 253,402,300,799,999.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="milliseconds" /> 大於 253,402,300,799,999。

trans-unit.source: A Unix time, expressed as the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z (January 1, 1970, at 12:00 AM UTC).
trans-unit.target: 自 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z (1970 年 1 月 1 日上午 12:00 UTC) 以來所經過的 Unix 時間 (以秒數表示)。

trans-unit.source: For Unix times before this date, its value is negative.
trans-unit.target: 若是在此日期之前的 Unix 時間點，其值為負數。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Unix time expressed as the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z to a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 將自 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z 以來所經過的 Unix 時間 (以秒數表示)，轉換成 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A date and time value that represents the same moment in time as the Unix time.
trans-unit.target: 表示與 Unix 時間相同時間點的日期和時間值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property value of the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> instance is <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which represents Coordinated Universal Time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>傳回之屬性值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>執行個體是<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>，代表國際標準時間。

trans-unit.source: You can convert it to the time in a specific time zone by calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將它轉換為特定時區的時間，藉由呼叫<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="seconds" /> is less than -62,135,596,800.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="seconds" /> 小於 -62,135,596,800。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="seconds" /> is greater than 253,402,300,799.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="seconds" /> 大於 253,402,300,799。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hour component of the time represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件表示之時間的時數元件。

trans-unit.source: The hour component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的時數元件。

trans-unit.source: This property uses a 24-hour clock; the value ranges from 0 to 23.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性使用 24 小時制，且值的範圍從 0 到 23。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Hour%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Hour%2A>屬性的值不受影響<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's hour component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "H", or "HH" custom format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立的字串表示法<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>藉由呼叫物件的小時元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>方法將"H"或"HH"自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the hour component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object in three different ways:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的小時元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件三種不同的方式：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Hour%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所擷取的值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Hour%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "H" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>使用"H"格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "HH" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>方法以"HH"格式規範。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that represents the local date and time of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值，這個值表示目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的本地日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The local date and time of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的當地日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.LocalDateTime%2A> property converts the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's date and time to the local system's date and time.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.LocalDateTime%2A>屬性將目前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件的日期和時間為本機系統的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The conversion is a two-step operation:
trans-unit.target: 轉換是兩個步驟作業：

trans-unit.source: The property converts the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 屬性會將目前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件的時間為國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The property then converts UTC to local time.
trans-unit.target: 屬性然後將轉換為本地時間的 UTC。

trans-unit.source: There are no invalid times and ambiguous times are mapped to the local zone's standard time.
trans-unit.target: 有沒有無效的時間和當地時區標準時間對應模稜兩可的時間。

trans-unit.source: (However, the conversion can create an anomaly: if a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value that is derived from the local computer reflects an ambiguous date and time, that value can be converted to UTC and then back to a local time that differs from the original time.) The property applies any adjustment rules in the local time zone when it performs this conversion.
trans-unit.target: (不過，轉換可以建立異常狀況： 如果<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>衍生自本機電腦的值反映模稜兩可的日期和時間，值可以轉換成 UTC，然後再回到不同於原始時間的本地時間。)執行這項轉換時，該屬性適用於任何以當地時區的調整規則。

trans-unit.source: This property returns both the date and the time component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object, which makes it useful for <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> to <xref:System.DateTime> conversion.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回日期和時間元件的<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件，使用於<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>至<xref:System.DateTime>轉換。

trans-unit.source: In addition to performing any necessary time conversion, this property differs from the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime%2A> property by setting the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除了執行任何所需的時間轉換，這個屬性與不同<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime%2A>屬性的值設定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>物件<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates several conversions of <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values to local times in the U.S. Pacific Standard Time zone.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明的幾個轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值以本地時間，在美國太平洋時區太平洋標準時區。

trans-unit.source: Note that the last three times are all ambiguous; the property maps all of them to a single date and time in the Pacific Standard Time zone.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，最後三次所有模稜兩可。此屬性可讓它們全部對應到單一日期和時間在太平洋標準時間區域中。

trans-unit.source: Represents the greatest possible value of <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 的最大可能值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM +00:00.

The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue> property is used to determine whether the value of a new <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object or the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value returned by an arithmetic operation is the same as or earlier than this maximum range value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue>屬性用來判斷是否的新值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>算術運算所傳回的值是相同於還是早於此最大範圍值。

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before the method compares it with <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值會轉換為國際標準時間 (UTC)，此方法會比較它與前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue>。

trans-unit.source: This means that a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value whose date and time are close to the maximum range, but whose offset is negative, may throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 這表示<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值的日期和時間已接近最大的範圍，但其位移是負數，可能會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value 12/31/9999 11:00 PM -02:00 is out of range because it is one hour later than <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue> when it is converted to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 12/31/9999 11:00 PM-02:00，超出範圍，因為它是一小時晚於<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue>時將它轉換成 UTC。

trans-unit.source: Some calendars, such as the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>, support an upper date range that is earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 部分月曆，例如<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>，支援早於上方的日期範圍<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, trying to access <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> in variable assignments or formatting and parsing operations can throw an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，嘗試存取<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>指派變數或格式化和剖析作業可能會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: Instead of retrieving the value of <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you can retrieve the value of the specified culture's latest valid date value from the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 而擷取的值不是<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，您可以擷取從指定的文化特性最有效的日期值的<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" /> is outside the range of the current or specified culture's default calendar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" /> 已超出目前或指定的文化特性的預設行事曆範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the millisecond component of the time represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件所表示之時間的毫秒數元件。

trans-unit.source: The millisecond component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as an integer between 0 and 999.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的毫秒數元件，以 0 到 999 之間的整數表示。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's millisecond component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "fff" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立的字串表示法<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>藉由呼叫物件的毫秒數元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>以"fff"自訂格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: If you rely on properties such as <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcNow%2A> to accurately track the number of elapsed milliseconds, the precision of the time's millisecond component depends on the resolution of the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 如果您依賴屬性例如<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A>或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcNow%2A>才能正確地追蹤整體的毫秒數，時間的毫秒元件的有效位數取決於系統時鐘的解析度。

trans-unit.source: On Windows NT 3.5 and later, and Windows Vista operating systems, the clock's resolution is approximately 10-15 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows NT 3.5 （含） 更新版本和 Windows Vista 作業系統中，時鐘的解析度是大約為 10-15 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the number of milliseconds of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object by using a custom format specifier and by directly accessing the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Millisecond%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示毫秒數<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件使用的自訂格式規範，以及透過直接存取<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Millisecond%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minute component of the time represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件所表示之時間的分鐘數元件。

trans-unit.source: The minute component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as an integer between 0 and 59.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的分鐘數元件，以 0 到 59 之間的整數表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Minute%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Minute%2A>屬性的值不受影響<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's minute component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "m", or "mm" custom format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立的字串表示法<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>藉由呼叫物件的分鐘元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>使用"m"或"mm"自訂格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the minute component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object in three different ways:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的分鐘元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件三種不同的方式：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Minute%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所擷取的值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Minute%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "m" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>使用"m"格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "mm" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>以"mm"格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: Represents the earliest possible <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 表示最早的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 可能值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM +00:00.

The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue> property is used to determine whether the value of a new <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object or the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value returned by an arithmetic operation is the same as or later than this minimum range value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>屬性用來判斷是否的新值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>算術運算所傳回的值是相同於還是晚於此最小範圍值。

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before the method performs the comparison with <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值會轉換為國際標準時間 (UTC)，此方法會執行與比較之前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>。

trans-unit.source: This means that a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value whose date and time are close to the minimum range, but whose offset is positive, may throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 這表示<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值的日期和時間已接近最小的範圍，但其位移是正數，便可能會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value 1/1/0001 1:00:00 AM +02:00 is out of range because it is one hour earlier than <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue> when it is converted to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 1/1/0001 1:00:00 AM + 02:00，超出範圍，因為它是一小時早於<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>時將它轉換成 UTC。

trans-unit.source: Gets the month component of the date represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件所表示之日期的月份元件。

trans-unit.source: The month component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as an integer between 1 and 12.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的月份元件，以 1 到 12 之間的整數表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Month%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Month%2A>屬性的值不受影響<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's month component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "M" or "MM" custom format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立的字串表示法<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>藉由呼叫物件的月份元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>使用"M"或"MM"自訂格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the month component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value in three different ways:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的月份元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>三種不同方式的值：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Month%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所擷取的值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Month%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "M" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>使用"M"格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "MM" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>以"MM"格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object that is set to the current date and time on the current computer, with the offset set to the local time's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件，這個物件的日期和時間已設定為目前電腦上的目前日期和時間，而位移已設定為本地時間相對於 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 的位移。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object whose date and time is the current local time and whose offset is the local time zone's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件，其日期和時間為目前本地時間，而位移為本地時區相對於 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 的位移。

trans-unit.source: The precision of the current local time's millisecond component depends on the resolution of the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 目前的當地時間的毫秒數元件的精確度會根據系統時鐘的解析度而定。

trans-unit.source: On Windows NT 3.5 and later, and Windows Vista operating systems, the clock's resolution is approximately 10-15 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows NT 3.5 （含） 更新版本和 Windows Vista 作業系統中，時鐘的解析度是大約為 10-15 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A> property to retrieve the current date and time and displays it by using each of the [standard date and time format strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) supported by the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> type.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A>屬性，以擷取目前的日期和時間，並顯示每個使用[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)支援<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>型別。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A> and <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Millisecond%2A> properties to determine the resolution of the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A>和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Millisecond%2A>屬性，以決定系統時鐘的解析度。

trans-unit.source: It displays the time only when the value of its millisecond component has changed.
trans-unit.target: 它會顯示的時間只毫秒數元件的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 取得 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 的時間位移。

trans-unit.source: The difference between the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object's time value and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的時間值和 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 之間的時差。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.TimeSpan> object can range from -14 hours to 14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件的範圍從-14 小時到 14 小時。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property is precise to the minute.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性是精確的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property to display the local time's difference from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性以顯示本機時間的差異與國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The object to add the time interval to.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入時間間隔的物件。

trans-unit.source: The time interval to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified time interval to a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object that has a specified date and time, and yields a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object that has new a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的時間間隔加入至具有指定日期和時間的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件，並產生具有新日期和時間的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An object whose value is the sum of the values of <paramref name="dateTimeTz" /> and <paramref name="timeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其值為 <paramref name="dateTimeTz" /> 和 <paramref name="timeSpan" /> 值的總和。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Addition%2A>方法定義加法運算，如<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值。

trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否有兩個<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件代表相同的時間，與具有相同的位移的值，使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: Defines an implicit conversion of a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 定義從 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 物件到 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的隱含轉換。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Implicit%2A> method enables the compiler to automatically convert a <xref:System.DateTime> object to a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object without an explicit casting operator (in C#) or a call to a conversion function (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Implicit%2A>方法可讓編譯器將會自動轉換<xref:System.DateTime>物件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>而不需要明確轉型運算子 （C# 中） 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的轉換函式呼叫的物件。

trans-unit.source: It defines a widening conversion that does not involve data loss and does not throw an <xref:System.OverflowException>.
trans-unit.target: 它會定義擴展轉換，並不會遺失資料，並不會擲回<xref:System.OverflowException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Implicit%2A> method makes code such as the following possible:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Implicit%2A>方法會使下列可以使用如下的程式碼：

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object depends on the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the `dateTime` parameter:
trans-unit.target: 產生的位移<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件取決於值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`dateTime`參數：

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the date and time of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is set equal to `dateTime`, and its <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property is set equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>，日期和時間<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件設為等於`dateTime`，且其<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性設為等於 0。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the date and time of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is set equal to `dateTime`, and its <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property is set equal to the offset of the local system's current time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>，日期和時間<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件設為等於`dateTime`，且其<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性設為等於的本機系統的目前設定的時區位移。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time that results from applying the offset is earlier than <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date, time, and offset to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將日期、時間和位移之指定的字串表示轉換為其對等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in <paramref name="input" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="input" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%29> parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%29> 會剖析具有三個元素可以依任何順序出現，且以空白字元分隔的字串。

trans-unit.source: These three elements are as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 這三個元素會在下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: \<Date>
trans-unit.target: \<日期 >

trans-unit.source: \<Time>
trans-unit.target: \<Time>

trans-unit.source: \<Offset>
trans-unit.target: \<Offset>

trans-unit.source: Although each of these elements is optional, \<Offset> cannot appear by itself.
trans-unit.target: 每個這些項目是選擇性的雖然\<位移 > 不能單獨出現。

trans-unit.source: It must be provided together with either \<Date> or \<Time>.
trans-unit.target: 它必須提供搭配 \<日期 > 或\<時間 >。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is missing, its default value is the current day.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 遺漏，其預設值是目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: If \<Time> is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<時間 > 遺漏，其預設值是 12:00:00 AM。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 存在但其元件的組成只有兩位數的年份，它會轉換成目前的文化特性的現行曆法為基礎的值中之年<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If \<Offset> is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<位移 > 遺漏，其預設值是當地時區位移。

trans-unit.source: \<Offset> can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: \<位移 > 可以表示為負數或正數的位移與國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: In either case, \<Offset> must include a sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情況下，\<位移 > 必須包含正負號。

trans-unit.source: The `input` string is parsed by using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is initialized for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: `input`所使用的格式設定資訊中剖析字串<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>初始化目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: To parse a string that contains designated formatting that does not necessarily correspond to the formatting of the current culture, use the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%2A> method and provide a format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 若要剖析的字串，其中包含指定之格式設定不一定對應到目前的文化特性的格式，使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%2A>方法，並提供的格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%29> method to parse several date and time strings.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%29>方法來剖析數個日期和時間的字串。

trans-unit.source: The example includes output from March 22, 2007, on a system whose culture is en-us.
trans-unit.target: 此範例包含從 2007 年 3 月 22 日，輸出會在 en-us 文化特性的系統上-我們。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 位移大於 14 小時或小於 -14 小時。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="input" /> contains the string representation of an offset value without a date or time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含位移值的字串表示 (不含日期或時間)。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides culture-specific format information about <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>input</c> 的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent using the specified culture-specific format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的特定文化特性格式資訊，將日期和時間的指定字串表示轉換為其對等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in <paramref name="input" />, as specified by <paramref name="formatProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="input" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: This method parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會剖析具有三個元素可以依任何順序出現，且以空白字元分隔的字串。

trans-unit.source: These three elements are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中，會顯示這三個元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: \<Date>
trans-unit.target: \<日期 >

trans-unit.source: \<Time>
trans-unit.target: \<Time>

trans-unit.source: \<Offset>
trans-unit.target: \<Offset>

trans-unit.source: Although each of these elements is optional, \<Offset> cannot appear by itself.
trans-unit.target: 每個這些項目是選擇性的雖然\<位移 > 不能單獨出現。

trans-unit.source: It must be provided together with either \<Date> or \<Time>.
trans-unit.target: 它必須提供搭配 \<日期 > 或\<時間 >。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is missing, its default value is the current day.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 遺漏，其預設值是目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 存在但其元件的組成只有兩位數的年份，它會轉換成中之年`provider`參數的現行曆法為基礎的值<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If \<Time> is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<時間 > 遺漏，其預設值是 12:00:00 AM。

trans-unit.source: If \<Offset> is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<位移 > 遺漏，其預設值是當地時區位移。

trans-unit.source: \<Offset> can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: \<位移 > 可以表示為負數或正數的位移與國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: In either case, \<Offset> must include a sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情況下，\<位移 > 必須包含正負號。

trans-unit.source: The format of these three elements is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, which can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: 這三個元素的格式由所定義`formatProvider`參數，可以是下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in the `input` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，表示其格式設定中使用的文化特性`input`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting used in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會定義所使用的格式`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: If `formatprovider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The positive or negative sign used in \<Offset> must be either + or -.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的正或負號\<位移 > 必須是 + 或-。

trans-unit.source: It is not defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A> or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object of the `formatProvider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不由定義<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>物件`formatProvider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following example parses date and time strings that are formatted for the fr-fr culture and displays them using the local system's default en-us culture.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會剖析日期和時間的字串為 fr-fr 文化特性的格式設定和顯示它們使用本機系統的預設 en-us-文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 位移大於 14 小時或小於 -14 小時。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="input" /> contains the string representation of an offset value without a date or time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含位移值的字串表示 (不含日期或時間)。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides culture-specific format information about <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>input</c> 的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the permitted format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，表示 <c>input</c> 所允許的輸入格式。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 一般會指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent using the specified culture-specific format information and formatting style.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的特定文化特性格式資訊和格式樣式，將日期和時間的指定字串表示轉換為其對等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in <paramref name="input" /> as specified by <paramref name="formatProvider" /> and <paramref name="styles" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="input" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 和 <paramref name="styles" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: This method parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會剖析具有三個元素可以依任何順序出現，且以空白字元分隔的字串。

trans-unit.source: These three elements are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中，會顯示這三個元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: \<Date>
trans-unit.target: \<日期 >

trans-unit.source: \<Time>
trans-unit.target: \<Time>

trans-unit.source: \<Offset>
trans-unit.target: \<Offset>

trans-unit.source: Although each of these elements is optional, \<Offset> cannot appear by itself.
trans-unit.target: 每個這些項目是選擇性的雖然\<位移 > 不能單獨出現。

trans-unit.source: It must be provided together with either \<Date> or \<Time>.
trans-unit.target: 它必須提供搭配 \<日期 > 或\<時間 >。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is missing, its default value is the current day.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 遺漏，其預設值是目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 存在但其元件的組成只有兩位數的年份，它會轉換成中之年`provider`參數的現行曆法為基礎的值<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If \<Time> is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<時間 > 遺漏，其預設值是 12:00:00 AM。

trans-unit.source: If \<Offset> is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone, or <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType> if either the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is specified in the `styles` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<位移 > 遺漏，其預設值是當地時區位移或<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>該值會以指定`styles`參數。

trans-unit.source: If \<Offset> is present, it can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 如果\<位移 > 已存在，它可以表示為負數或正數位移與國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: In either case, \<Offset> must include a sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情況下，\<位移 > 必須包含正負號。

trans-unit.source: The format of these three elements is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, which can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: 這三個元素的格式由所定義`formatProvider`參數，可以是下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in the `input` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，表示其格式設定中使用的文化特性`input`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting used in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會定義所使用的格式`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: Each element can also be enclosed by leading or trailing white space, and the \<Date> and \<Time> elements can include inner white space (such as 6: 00:00).
trans-unit.target: 每個項目也可以加前置或尾端空格，而\<日期 > 和\<時間 > 項目可以包含內部的泛空白字元 （例如 6: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: Only the \<Offset> component cannot include inner white space.
trans-unit.target: 只有\<位移 > 元件不能包含內部空格。

trans-unit.source: If `formatprovider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The positive or negative sign used in \<Offset> must be either + or -.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的正或負號\<位移 > 必須是 + 或-。

trans-unit.source: It is not defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A> or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the `formatProvider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不由定義<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>所傳回物件`formatProvider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration that are supported.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的成員<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType>支援的列舉。

trans-unit.source: DateTimeStyles member
trans-unit.target: DateTimeStyles 成員

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Parses the string represented by `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 剖析字串，由`input`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to parsing a string and then calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於剖析字串，然後再呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法傳回之<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 雖然有效，但會忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Inner white space is permitted in the \<Date> and \<Time> elements.
trans-unit.target: 中可以使用內部空白字元\<日期 > 和\<時間 > 項目。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 雖然有效，但會忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Leading white space is permitted in front of each component in the parsed string.
trans-unit.target: 剖析字串中的每個元件之前，可以使用前置空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 雖然有效，但會忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Trailing white space is permitted in front of each component in the parsed string.
trans-unit.target: 剖析字串中的每個元件之前，可以使用尾端泛空白字元。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為。

trans-unit.source: It cannot be overridden by supplying a more restrictive <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration value, such as <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 無法藉由提供更具限制性覆寫<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>列舉值，例如<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that, if the `input` parameter lacks an \<Offset> element, the offset of the local time zone should be provided.
trans-unit.target: 表示如果`input`參數缺少\<位移 > 項目，應該提供的當地時區位移。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為的<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that, if the `input` parameter lacks an \<Offset> element, the UTC offset (00:00) should be provided.
trans-unit.target: 表示如果`input`參數缺少\<位移 > 項目，應該提供 UTC 時差 (00:00)。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored and has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 雖然有效，但此值會被忽略，而且沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> structure does not include a `Kind` property, this value has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>結構未包含`Kind`屬性，這個值就沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 只有<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>不支援值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown if this value is included in the `styles` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArgumentException>中包含這個值會擲回`styles`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the effect of passing the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> values to the `styles` parameter of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範傳遞的影響<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>值`styles`參數<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 位移大於 14 小時或小於 -14 小時。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="styles" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="styles" /> includes an unsupported <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 包含不受支援的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="styles" /> includes <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> values that cannot be used together.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 包含無法同時使用的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="input" /> contains the string representation of an offset value without a date or time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含位移值的字串表示 (不含日期或時間)。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match a specified format exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示的格式必須完全符合指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A format specifier that defines the expected format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 格式規範，其定義 <c>input</c> 應有的格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>input</c> 的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent using the specified format and culture-specific format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式以及特定文化特性的格式資訊，將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示的格式必須完全符合指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in <paramref name="input" /> as specified by <paramref name="format" /> and <paramref name="formatProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="input" /> 中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="format" /> 和 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法剖析字串表示法中所定義的格式必須是日期`format`參數。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that the \<Date>, \<Time>, and \<Offset> elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 它也需要\<日期 >，\<時間 >，並\<位移 > 日期和時間的字串表示的項目會出現在所指定的順序`format`。

trans-unit.source: If the `input` string does not match this `format` parameter, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`input`字串不符合這`format`參數，方法會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
