trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法剖析日期的任何一種格式提供者所辨識的格式的字串表示<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> also allows the \<Date>, \<Time>, and \<Offset> elements of the string representation of a date and time to appear in any order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> 也可讓\<日期 >，\<時間 >，並\<位移 > 要以任何順序出現的日期和時間的字串表示的項目。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of the `input` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式字串`input`參數。

trans-unit.source: For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有效格式的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`包含`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自訂格式規範來指出位移必須存在於`input`，該時差必須包含負號或正號。

trans-unit.source: If the sign is missing, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果正負號，方法會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00).
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而非時間，產生<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件指派午夜的時間 (0: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned the current date on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`要求`input`包含時間，但不是日期，產生<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件指派本機系統上目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned the time zone offset of the local system.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`不需要`input`包含表示所產生的位移<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>指派的本機系統時區時差的物件。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, as is the precise format of `input` if `format` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和時間符號和使用的字串`input`會由`formatProvider`參數，因為是精確的格式`input`如果`format`是標準格式規範的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件代表的文化特性，依據`input`解譯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回的物件及其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>屬性會定義符號與中的格式化`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: If `formatprovider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with standard and custom format specifiers and the invariant culture to parse several date and time strings.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>與標準和自訂格式規範和文化特性而異，剖析數個日期和時間字串的方法。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 位移大於 14 小時或小於 -14 小時。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="format" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="format" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The hour component and the AM/PM designator in <paramref name="input" /> do not agree.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 中的小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不一致。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <see cref="Overload:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact" /> method throws a <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<see cref="Overload:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact" />方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.FormatException" />小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不在協議中，如果包含要剖析的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和舊版中，AM/PM 指示項會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A format specifier that defines the expected format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 格式規範，其定義 <c>input</c> 應有的格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>input</c> 的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the permitted format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，表示 <c>input</c> 所允許的輸入格式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent using the specified format, culture-specific format information, and style.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式、特定文化特性格式資訊以及樣式，將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示的格式必須完全符合指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in the <paramref name="input" /> parameter, as specified by the <paramref name="format" />, <paramref name="formatProvider" />, and <paramref name="styles" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="input" /> 參數中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="format" />、<paramref name="formatProvider" /> 和 <paramref name="styles" /> 參數所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法剖析字串表示法中所定義的格式必須是日期`format`參數。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that the \<Date>, \<Time>, and \<Offset> elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 它也需要\<日期 >，\<時間 >，並\<位移 > 日期和時間的字串表示的項目會出現在所指定的順序`format`。

trans-unit.source: If the `input` string does not match the pattern of the `format` parameter, with any variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`input`字串不符合的模式`format`參數，所定義的任何變化`styles`參數，方法會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法剖析日期的任何一種格式提供者所辨識的格式的字串表示<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> also allows the \<Date>, \<Time>, and \<Offset> elements of the string representation of a date and time to appear in any order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> 也可讓\<日期 >，\<時間 >，並\<位移 > 要以任何順序出現的日期和時間的字串表示的項目。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required pattern of the `input` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的模式字串`input`參數。

trans-unit.source: For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有效格式的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`包含`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自訂格式規範來指出位移必須存在於`input`，該時差必須包含負號或正號。

trans-unit.source: If the sign is missing, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果正負號，方法會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00).
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而非時間，產生<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件指派午夜的時間 (0: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned the current date on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`要求`input`包含時間，但不是日期，產生<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件指派本機系統上目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`不需要`input`包含位移時，所產生的位移<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件取決於值`styles`參數。

trans-unit.source: If `styles` includes <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal>, the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal>，當地時區位移指派給<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: If `styles` includes <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal>, the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal>，Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 位移或 + 00:00，指派給<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定兩個值，則會使用當地時區位移。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和時間符號和使用的字串`input`會由`formatProvider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The same is true for the precise format of `input`, if `format` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 也是如此的正確格式`input`，如果`format`是標準格式規範的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件代表的文化特性，依據`input`解譯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會定義符號與中的格式化`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: If `formatprovider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is allowed in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: `styles`參數會定義是否允許空白字元，輸入字串中指示沒有明確的位移元件的字串剖析的方式，並支援 UTC 轉換在剖析作業的一部分。

trans-unit.source: All members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration are supported except <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault>.
trans-unit.target: 所有成員<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>列舉支援除了<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the effect of each supported member.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的每個成員的效果。

trans-unit.source: `DateTimeStyles` member
trans-unit.target: `DateTimeStyles` 成員

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行為

trans-unit.source: Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 剖析`input`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於剖析字串，然後再呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法傳回之<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is given the offset of the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`不需要`input`位移值，傳回<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件會得到的當地時區位移。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`不需要`input`位移值，傳回<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件會得到在 UTC 時差 （+ 00:00）。

trans-unit.source: Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 可讓`input`包含未指定的內部空白字元`format`。

trans-unit.source: Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components, and is ignored when parsing the string.
trans-unit.target: 額外的空白字元的日期和時間元件之間以及在個別的元件中可出現，且剖析字串時，會忽略。

trans-unit.source: Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 可讓`input`包含未指定的前置空格`format`。

trans-unit.source: These are ignored when parsing the string.
trans-unit.target: 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 可讓`input`包含尾端空白不由指定`format`。

trans-unit.source: These are ignored when parsing the string.
trans-unit.target: 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 可讓`input`加入不由指定的前置、 尾端，與內部空白`format`。

trans-unit.source: All extra white-space characters not specified in `format` are ignored when parsing the string.
trans-unit.target: 中未指定的所有額外泛空白字元`format`剖析字串時，會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`.
trans-unit.target: 表示中不允許其他空白字元`input`。

trans-unit.source: White space must appear exactly as specified in `format`.
trans-unit.target: 空白字元必須出現在指定的完全相同中`format`。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為。

trans-unit.source: Has no effect because the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> structure does not include a `Kind` property.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何作用，因為<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>結構未包含`Kind`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with standard and custom format specifiers, the invariant culture, and various <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> values to parse several date and time strings.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法並有標準和自訂格式規範，而異的文化特性，以及各種<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>剖析數個日期和時間字串的值。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 位移大於 14 小時或小於 -14 小時。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="styles" /> parameter includes an unsupported value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 參數包含不受支援的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="styles" /> parameter contains <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> values that cannot be used together.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 參數包含無法同時使用的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="format" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="format" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 為空字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The hour component and the AM/PM designator in <paramref name="input" /> do not agree.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 中的小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不一致。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <see cref="Overload:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact" /> method throws a <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<see cref="Overload:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact" />方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.FormatException" />小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不在協議中，如果包含要剖析的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和舊版中，AM/PM 指示項會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要轉換的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: An array of format specifiers that define the expected formats of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 格式規範陣列，定義 <c>input</c> 的預期格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供關於 <c>input</c> 的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the permitted format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合，表示 <c>input</c> 所允許的輸入格式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent using the specified formats, culture-specific format information, and style.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式、文化特性特定格式資訊以及樣式，將日期和時間的指定字串表示轉換為其對等的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match one of the specified formats exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示的格式必須完全符合其中一個指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in the <paramref name="input" /> parameter, as specified by the <paramref name="formats" />, <paramref name="formatProvider" />, and <paramref name="styles" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 物件，與 <paramref name="input" /> 參數中包含的日期和時間相等，如 <paramref name="formats" />、<paramref name="formatProvider" /> 和 <paramref name="styles" /> 參數所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法剖析符合指派給任何的模式一個日期的字串表示`formats`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the `input` string does not match any one of these patterns with any of the variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`input`字串不符合任何一種模式與任何所定義的變化`styles`參數，方法會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: Aside from comparing `input` to multiple formatting patterns, this overload behaves identically to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 除了比較`input`至多個格式模式，這個多載的行為即會相同與<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements contain either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the possible pattern of the `input` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `formats`參數是字串陣列，其項目包含單一標準格式規範或定義的可能模式的一或多個自訂格式規範`input`參數。

trans-unit.source: When the method is called, `input` must match one of these patterns.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，`input`必須符合其中一種模式。

trans-unit.source: For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有效格式的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the matched element in `formats` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的相符項目`formats`包含`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自訂格式規範來指出位移必須存在於`input`，該時差必須包含負號或正號。

trans-unit.source: If the sign is missing, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果正負號，方法會擲回<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: Using the `formats` parameter of this overload to specify multiple formats can help reduce the frustration many users experience when they enter dates and times.
trans-unit.target: 使用`formats`的這個多載來指定多個格式的參數可協助您減少許多使用者遇到進入日期和時間時的不便。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the ability to define multiple input patterns enables an application to handle date and time representations that can either include or lack leading zeros in months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，能夠定義多個輸入的模式可讓應用程式處理可以包括或是缺少中幾個月、 天、 小時、 分鐘和秒的前置零的日期和時間表示。

trans-unit.source: The example provides an illustration of this.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例將提供這個說明。

trans-unit.source: If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00).
trans-unit.target: 如果中的相符項目`formats`要求`input`包含日期而非時間，產生<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件指派午夜的時間 (0: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned the current date on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的相符項目`formats`要求`input`包含時間，但不是日期，產生<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件指派本機系統上目前的日期。

trans-unit.source: If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的相符項目`formats`不需要`input`包含位移時，所產生的位移<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件取決於值`styles`參數。

trans-unit.source: If `styles` includes <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal>, the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal>，當地時區位移指派給<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: If `styles` includes <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal>, the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`styles`包含<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal>，Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 位移或 + 00:00，指派給<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定兩個值，則會使用當地時區位移。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和時間符號和使用的字串`input`會由`formatProvider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The same is true for the precise format of `input`, if the matching element of `formats` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 也是如此的正確格式`input`，如果相符的項目的`formats`是標準格式規範的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件代表的文化特性，依據`input`解譯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會定義符號與中的格式化`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: If `formatprovider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is permitted in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: `styles`參數會定義是否允許空白字元，輸入字串中指示沒有明確的位移元件的字串剖析的方式，並支援 UTC 轉換在剖析作業的一部分。

trans-unit.source: All members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration are supported except <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault>.
trans-unit.target: 所有成員<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>列舉支援除了<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the effect of each supported member.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的每個成員的效果。

trans-unit.source: `DateTimeStyles` member
trans-unit.target: `DateTimeStyles` 成員

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行為

trans-unit.source: Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 剖析`input`而且，如果有必要，將它轉換成 UTC。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於剖析字串，然後再呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法傳回之<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is given the offset of the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的相符項目`formats`不需要`input`位移值，傳回<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件會得到的當地時區位移。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).
trans-unit.target: 如果中的相符項目`formats`不需要`input`位移值，傳回<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件會得到在 UTC 時差 （+ 00:00）。

trans-unit.source: Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 可讓`input`包含未指定的內部空白字元`format`。

trans-unit.source: Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components (except the offset), and is ignored when parsing the string.
trans-unit.target: 額外的空白字元的日期和時間元件之間以及在個別的元件 （除了位移），可出現，且剖析字串時，會忽略。

trans-unit.source: Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by `formats`.
trans-unit.target: 可讓`input`包含未指定的前置空格`formats`。

trans-unit.source: These are ignored when parsing the string.
trans-unit.target: 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by `formats`.
trans-unit.target: 可讓`input`包含尾端空白不由指定`formats`。

trans-unit.source: These are ignored when parsing the string.
trans-unit.target: 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by `formats`.
trans-unit.target: 可讓`input`加入不由指定的前置、 尾端，與內部空白`formats`。

trans-unit.source: All extra white-space characters not specified in the matched element in `formats` are ignored when parsing the string.
trans-unit.target: 中的相符項目中未指定的所有額外泛空白字元`formats`剖析字串時，會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`.
trans-unit.target: 表示中不允許其他空白字元`input`。

trans-unit.source: White space must appear exactly as specified in a particular element of `formats` for a match to occur.
trans-unit.target: 空白字元必須出現在指定的完全相同的特定元素中`formats`進行比對。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為。

trans-unit.source: Has no effect because the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> structure does not include a `Kind` property.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何作用，因為<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>結構未包含`Kind`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines multiple input formats for the string representation of a date and time and offset value, and then passes the string that is entered by the user to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義多個輸入的格式字串表示的日期與時間和位移的值，並接著會將使用者輸入的字串傳遞<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 位移大於 14 小時或小於 -14 小時。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="styles" /> includes an unsupported value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 包含不受支援的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="styles" /> parameter contains <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> values that cannot be used together.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 參數包含無法同時使用的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示。

trans-unit.source: -or-
No element of <paramref name="formats" /> contains a valid format specifier.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="formats" /> 的項目都未包含有效的格式規範。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The hour component and the AM/PM designator in <paramref name="input" /> do not agree.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 中的小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不一致。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <see cref="Overload:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact" /> method throws a <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<see cref="Overload:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact" />方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.FormatException" />小時元件和 AM/PM 指示項不在協議中，如果包含要剖析的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和舊版中，AM/PM 指示項會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Gets the second component of the clock time represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件所表示之時鐘時間的秒數元件。

trans-unit.source: The second component of the <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as an integer value between 0 and 59.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的秒數元件，以 0 到 59 之間的整數表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Second%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Second%2A>屬性的值不受影響<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's second component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "s", or "ss" custom format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立的字串表示法<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>藉由呼叫物件的第二個元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>"s"，或"ss"自訂格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the second component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object in three different ways:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的第二個元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件三種不同的方式：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Second%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所擷取的值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Second%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "s" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>以"s"格式規範的方法。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "ss" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>撘"ss"格式規範。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a specified time or duration from the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件減去指定的時間或持續期間。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the value to subtract.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示要減去的值。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value that represents a specific date and time from the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件減去表示特定日期和時間的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the interval between the two <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定兩個 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的間隔。

trans-unit.source: This method converts both <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before calculating the time interval that separates them.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將兩者<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>計算分隔的時間間隔之前的物件為國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: This removes any effect that different offsets from UTC may have on the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這會移除比較不同的 UTC 位移可能造成任何影響。

trans-unit.source: For languages that support custom operators, you can also perform date and time subtraction by using the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 支援自訂運算子的語言，您也可以使用減法運算子執行的日期和時間的減法。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Subtraction%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Subtraction%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Because neither the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object nor the `value` parameter represent the date and time in a specific time zone, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.DateTimeOffset%29> method does not consider a particular time zone's adjustment rules when it subtracts dates and times.
trans-unit.target: 因為沒有目前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件和`value`參數代表的日期和時間以特定的時區，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.DateTimeOffset%29>方法不會考慮特定時區的調整規則時它將日期和時間減去。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates subtraction that uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.DateTimeOffset%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明使用減法<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.DateTimeOffset%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The time interval to subtract.
trans-unit.target: 要減去的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a specified time interval from the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件減去指定的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equal to the date and time represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, minus the time interval represented by <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，等於目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件所代表的日期和時間減去 <paramref name="value" /> 所代表的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%2A> method to subtract more than one kind of time interval (days, hours, minutes, seconds, or milliseconds) in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%2A>来減去的時間間隔 （天、 小時、 分鐘、 秒或毫秒為單位） 在單一作業中的多個類型的方法。

trans-unit.source: Its behavior is identical to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Subtraction%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29> method, which defines the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: 其行為等同於<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Subtraction%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29>方法，定義減法運算子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> structure also supports specialized addition methods (such as <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.AddDays%2A>, <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.AddHours%2A>, and <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.AddMinutes%2A>) that allow you to perform subtraction by assigning a negative value to the method parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>結構也支援特殊的加法方法 (例如<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.AddDays%2A>， <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.AddHours%2A>，和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.AddMinutes%2A>) 可讓您將負值指派給方法參數來執行減法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回新<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件。

trans-unit.source: It does not modify the value of the current object by adding `timeSpan` to its date and time.
trans-unit.target: 不會修改目前物件的值加`timeSpan`其日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%2A> method does not affect the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%2A>方法不會影響值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件的<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object has the same offset as the original object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件具有相同的位移為原始物件。

trans-unit.source: Because the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object does not represent the date and time in a specific time zone, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29> method does not consider a particular time zone's adjustment rules when it performs the subtraction.
trans-unit.target: 因為目前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件不代表的日期和時間在特定的時區，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29>方法不會考慮特定時區的調整規則時，它會執行減法運算。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates subtraction that uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明使用減法<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value is less than <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值小於 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value is greater than <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值大於 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object with another object of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的值與相同型別的其他物件進行比較。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that indicates whether the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object is less than, equal to, or greater than <paramref name="obj" />.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，表示目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件是小於、等於還是大於 <paramref name="obj" />。

trans-unit.source: The return values of the method are interpreted as follows:
trans-unit.target: 方法的傳回值依如下解譯：

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Return Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 傳回值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term>小於零

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object is less than (earlier than) <paramref name="obj" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description>目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件小於 (早於) <paramref name="obj" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 零

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object is equal to (the same point in time as) <paramref name="obj" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description>目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件等於 <paramref name="obj" /> (時間點相同)。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 大於零

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object is greater than (later than) <paramref name="obj" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description>目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件大於 (晚於) <paramref name="obj" />。

trans-unit.source: The object that initiated the callback.
trans-unit.target: 初始化回呼 (Callback) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The functionality for this parameter is not currently implemented.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數的功能目前未實作。

trans-unit.source: Runs when the deserialization of an object has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 在物件完成還原序列化時執行。

trans-unit.source: The object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要填入資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization (see <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />).
trans-unit.target: 這個序列化的目的端 (請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />)。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the data required to serialize the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化目前 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件所需的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="info" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of ticks that represents the date and time of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object in clock time.
trans-unit.target: 取得刻度數，這個值表示目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件之時鐘時間的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The number of ticks in the <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object's clock time.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件之時間的刻度數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Ticks%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Ticks%2A>屬性的值不受影響<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Ticks%2A> property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight on January 1, 0001 (the value of <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>).
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Ticks%2A>屬性表示 0001 年 1 月 1 日 12:00:00 午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數 (值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>)。

trans-unit.source: It does not include ticks that would be added by leap seconds.
trans-unit.target: 它不包含會加入閏秒的刻度。

trans-unit.source: A nanosecond is one billionth of a second; there are ten million ticks in a second.
trans-unit.target: 奈秒是一個十億分之一秒;第二個有十個百萬個刻度。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Ticks%2A> property ranges from `DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks` to `DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Ticks%2A>屬性範圍從`DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks`至`DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`。

trans-unit.source: You can assign the number of ticks to a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object by using the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29> constructor overload.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指派的刻度數<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%28System.Int64%2CSystem.TimeSpan%29>建構函式多載。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object by approximating the number of ticks in the date July 1, 2008 1:23:07.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會初始化<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件趨中日期為 2008 年 7 月 1 日的刻度數 1:23:07。

trans-unit.source: It then displays the date and the number of ticks represented by that date to the console.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會顯示日期和日期表示主控台的刻度數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time of day for the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件之一天中的時間。

trans-unit.source: The time interval of the current date that has elapsed since midnight.
trans-unit.target: 自午夜起已經過之目前日期的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.TimeOfDay%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.TimeOfDay%2A>屬性的值不受影響<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.TimeOfDay%2A> property returns the time component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object in the form of a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.TimeOfDay%2A>屬性傳回的時間元件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件的形式<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to the <xref:System.DateTime.TimeOfDay%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於<xref:System.DateTime.TimeOfDay%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.TimeOfDay%2A> property to extract the time and display it to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.TimeOfDay%2A>屬性擷取的時間，並顯示到主控台。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object to a Windows file time.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的值轉換成 Windows 檔案時間。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as a Windows file time.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的值，以 Windows 檔案時間表示。

trans-unit.source: A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Windows 檔案時間是 64 位元值，表示 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file.
trans-unit.target: Windows 用來記錄應用程式建立、 存取，或寫入檔案時的檔案時間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToFileTime%2A> method converts the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's date and time to UTC before it performs the conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToFileTime%2A>方法將目前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件的日期和時間為 UTC 之前它會執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: In other words, calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToFileTime%2A> method is equivalent to the following method call:
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToFileTime%2A>方法相當於下列的方法呼叫：

trans-unit.source: The resulting file time would represent a date and time before midnight on January 1, 1601 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 產生的檔案時間將會表示在西元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜以前的日期和時間，

trans-unit.source: Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時間計算。

trans-unit.source: Converts the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object to a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object that represents the local time.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件轉換為表示本地時間的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the date and time of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object converted to local time.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示轉換為本地時間之目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: In performing the conversion to local time, the method first converts the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's date and time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) by subtracting the offset from the time.
trans-unit.target: 在執行本地時間轉換，此方法第一次將目前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件的日期和時間以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 減去的時間位移。

trans-unit.source: It then converts the UTC date and time to local time by adding the local time zone offset.
trans-unit.target: 它然後轉換為 UTC 日期和時間為本地時間的本地時間時區時差中增加。

trans-unit.source: In doing this, it takes account of any adjustment rules for the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業，它會採用的當地時區調整規則的帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Both the value of the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object and the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object returned by the method call represent the same point in time.
trans-unit.target: 目前值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件和值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>方法呼叫所傳回的物件可代表相同的點的時間。

trans-unit.source: That is, if both are passed to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the method will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，如果同時傳遞至<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，則方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion causes a time that is out of range of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> type, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToLocalTime%2A> method returns a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object that has the date and time set to either <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue> and the offset set to the local time zone offset.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換導致超出範圍的時間<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>型別，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToLocalTime%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件的日期和時間設定為 <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue>或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>以及已設定為本地時區位移的位移。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToLocalTime%2A> method to convert a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value to local time in the Pacific Standard Time zone.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToLocalTime%2A>方法，將轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>太平洋標準時間區域中的本機時間的值。

trans-unit.source: It also illustrates the method's support for the local time zone's adjustment rules.
trans-unit.target: 它也會說明本地時區的調整規則的方法的支援。

trans-unit.source: The offset to convert the <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value to.
trans-unit.target: 要將 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值轉換成的位移。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object to the date and time specified by an offset value.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的值轉換為位移值指定的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equal to the original <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object (that is, their <see cref="M:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime" /> methods return identical points in time) but whose <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset" /> property is set to <paramref name="offset" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，等於起始 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件 (即它們的 <see cref="M:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime" /> 方法都會傳回相同的時間點) 但其 <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset" /> 屬性設定成 <paramref name="offset" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToOffset%2A> method is an alternative to calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToOffset%2A>方法是呼叫的替代方式<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It can be useful for performing simple conversions from one time zone to another when the time zones' offsets from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) are known.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是適用於執行簡單的從一個時區轉換到另一個已知時區的位移與國際標準時間 (UTC) 時。

trans-unit.source: However, because neither the original <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object nor the new <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object returned by the method call are unambiguously related to a particular time zone, the method does not apply any time zone adjustment rules in the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為沒有原始<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件或新<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>方法呼叫所傳回的物件明確地與特定的時區，方法不套用任何轉換的時區調整規則。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to use the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToOffset%2A> method to convert a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object to a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object with a different offset.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToOffset%2A>方法，將轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件具有不同的位移。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object has a <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime" /> value earlier than <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生之 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime" /> 值早於 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object has a <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime" /> value later than <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生之 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime" /> 值晚於 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 -14 小時。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> is greater than 14 hours.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大於 14 小時。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的值，轉換為其相等的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的值，轉換為其相等的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object that includes the offset appended at the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 包含附加至字串尾端之位移的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件之字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this method is identical to that of the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, except that it includes a space followed by the offset appended at the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的傳回值是相同的<xref:System.DateTime.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，但是它包含空格後面附加在字串結尾的位移。

trans-unit.source: In other words, it formats output using the short date pattern, the long time pattern, and the `zzz` custom format string, with each element separated from the previous element by a space.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，使用簡短日期模式、 完整時間模式的輸出格式化和`zzz`自訂格式字串，從上一個項目，以空格隔開每個項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.DateTime.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns a value of 1/12/2008 6:15:50 PM, <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString> returns a value of 1/12/2008 6:15:50 PM -08:00 for a time that is eight hours behind Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果<xref:System.DateTime.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>傳回值的 2008 年 1 月 12 日 6:15:50 PM<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString>傳回值的 2008 年 1 月 12 日下午 6:15:50-08:00 是 8 小時後置 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時間。

trans-unit.source: This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用衍生自目前的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Other overloads of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method enable you to specify the culture whose formatting to use, and to define the output pattern of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value.
trans-unit.target: 其他多載<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>方法可讓您指定的文化特性格式化使用，以及定義輸出模式<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates calls to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString> method and displays its output on a system whose current culture is en-us.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何呼叫<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString>方法和目前文化特性是 en-us 的系統上顯示其輸出-我們。

trans-unit.source: The date and time is outside the range of dates supported by the calendar used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間超出目前文化特性使用之曆法所支援的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString" /> method returns the string representation of the date and time in the calendar used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString" />方法會傳回目前文化特性所使用的行事曆中的日期和時間的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> instance is earlier than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> or later than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />, the method throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的值<see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />執行個體是早於<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" />或更晚<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />，方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: It attempts to format a date that is outside the range of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar" /> class when the current culture is Arabic (Syria).
trans-unit.target: 它會嘗試以超出範圍的日期格式<see cref="T:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar" />類別目前的文化特性為阿拉伯文 （敘利亞） 時。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文化特性特定格式資訊，將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的值轉換為其對等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, as specified by <paramref name="formatProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件值的字串表示 (如 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 所指定)。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this method is identical to that of its equivalent overload of the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, except that it includes a space followed by the offset appended at the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的傳回值等同於其對等的多載的<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，但是它包含空格後面附加在字串結尾的位移。

trans-unit.source: In other words, it formats output using the short date pattern, the long time pattern, and the `zzz` custom format string, with each element separated from the previous element by a space.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，使用簡短日期模式、 完整時間模式的輸出格式化和`zzz`自訂格式字串，從上一個項目，以空格隔開每個項目。

trans-unit.source: The format of these three elements is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這三個元素的格式由所定義`formatProvider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are applied to the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表其格式設定慣例會套用至傳回之字串的文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: If `formatProvider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object associated with the current culture is used (see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatProvider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件 (請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object using <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects that represent the invariant culture, as well as four other cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表文化特性而異，以及四個其他文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The date and time is outside the range of dates supported by the calendar used by <paramref name="formatProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 日期與時間超出 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 使用之日曆所支援的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString(System.IFormatProvider)" /> method returns the string representation of the date and time in the calendar used by the culture represented by the <paramref name="formatProvider" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString(System.IFormatProvider)" />方法傳回的日期和時間的字串表示中所代表的文化特性所使用的行事曆<paramref name="formatProvider" />參數。

trans-unit.source: Its calendar is defined by the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 其行事曆由定義<see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> instance is earlier than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> or later than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />, the method throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的值<see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />執行個體是早於<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" />或更晚<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />，方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: It attempts to format a date that is outside the range of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 它會嘗試以超出範圍的日期格式<see cref="T:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar" />類別。

trans-unit.source: A format string.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式，將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的值，轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, as specified by <paramref name="format" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件值的字串表示 (如 <paramref name="format" /> 所指定)。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) that defines the format of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: `format`參數應該包含單一格式規範字元 (請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自訂格式模式 (請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))，定義傳回之字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is a null or empty string (""), the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value is output using the default format.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是 null 或空字串 ("")，則<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值會輸出使用的預設格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the exact operation of certain format specifiers when used with <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>, which differs from their behavior when used with <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示特定的格式規範搭配使用時的確切操作<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>，其行為與搭配使用時的不同<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: Existing format specifier
trans-unit.target: 現有的格式規範

trans-unit.source: New behavior
trans-unit.target: 新的行為

trans-unit.source: Designed to round-trip a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 設計用於反覆存取日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: With <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>, maps to "zzz" (the offset is always displayed with hours and minutes).
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>，對應至"zzz"（位移一律會顯示以小時和分鐘為單位）。

trans-unit.source: Note that "K" is a custom format specifier; it cannot appear as the single character in `format`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，"K"自訂格式規範。中的單一字元，它不能出現`format`。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援。

trans-unit.source: Converts the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and outputs it using the custom format string `ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 並將它使用的自訂格式字串輸出`ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`。

trans-unit.source: Converts the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object to UTC and outputs it using the format `yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>UTC 的物件，並將輸出的格式`yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`。

trans-unit.source: The remaining standard date and time format specifiers behave the same with the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method as they do with the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 其餘的標準日期和時間格式規範的行為相同，但是<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>方法一樣與<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用衍生自目前的文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object to the console using each of the standard date and time format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>主控台中使用每個標準日期和時間格式規範的物件。

trans-unit.source: The output is formatted by using the en-us culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用 en-us 格式化輸出的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="format" /> is one, and it is not one of the standard format specifier characters defined for <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 的長度為 1，而且不是針對 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 所定義的其中一個標準格式規範字元。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="format" /> does not contain a valid custom format pattern.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 並沒不包含有效的自訂格式模式。

trans-unit.source: The date and time is outside the range of dates supported by the calendar used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間超出目前文化特性使用之曆法所支援的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString(System.String)" /> method returns the string representation of the date and time in the calendar used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString(System.String)" />方法會傳回目前文化特性所使用的行事曆中的日期和時間的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> instance is earlier than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> or later than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />, the method throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的值<see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />執行個體是早於<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MinSupportedDateTime" />或更晚<see cref="P:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />，方法會擲回<see cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: It attempts to format a date that is outside the range of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar" /> class when the current culture is Hebrew (Israel).
trans-unit.target: 它會嘗試以超出範圍的日期格式<see cref="T:System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar" />類別目前的文化特性時希伯來文 （以色列）。

trans-unit.source: A format string.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format and culture-specific format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式和特定文化特性的格式資訊，將目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件的值，轉換為其相等的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the value of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, as specified by <paramref name="format" /> and <paramref name="provider" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 物件值的字串表示 (如 <paramref name="format" /> 和 <paramref name="provider" /> 所指定)。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)).
trans-unit.target: `format`參數應該包含單一格式規範字元 (請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自訂格式模式 (請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)).

trans-unit.source: If `format` is a null or empty string (""), the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is output using the default format.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是 null 或空字串 ("")，則<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>使用預設格式來輸出物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the exact operation of certain format specifiers when used with <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>, which differs from their behavior when used with <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示特定的格式規範搭配使用時的確切操作<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>，其行為與搭配使用時的不同<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: Existing format specifier
trans-unit.target: 現有的格式規範

trans-unit.source: New behavior
trans-unit.target: 新的行為

trans-unit.source: Designed to round-trip a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 設計用於反覆存取日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: With <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>, maps to "zzz" (the offset is always displayed with hours and minutes).
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>，對應至"zzz"（位移一律會顯示以小時和分鐘為單位）。

trans-unit.source: Note that "K" is a custom format specifier; it cannot appear as the single character in `format`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，"K"自訂格式規範。中的單一字元，它不能出現`format`。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援。

trans-unit.source: Converts the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and outputs it using the custom format string `ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 並將它使用的自訂格式字串輸出`ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`。

trans-unit.source: Converts the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value to UTC and outputs it using the format `yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>UTC 的值，並將輸出的格式`yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`。

trans-unit.source: The remaining standard date and time format specifiers behave the same with the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method as they do with the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 其餘的標準日期和時間格式規範的行為相同，但是<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>方法一樣與<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The pattern that corresponds to standard format specifiers, as well as the symbols and names of date and time components, is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 對應至標準格式規範，以及符號和的日期和時間元件名稱的模式由定義`formatProvider`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in `input`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，表示其格式設定中使用的文化特性`input`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting used in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會定義所使用的格式`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>物件，定義日期和時間資料的格式。

trans-unit.source: If `formatProvider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object associated with the current culture is used (see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatProvider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件 (請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to display a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object using a custom format string for several different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，以顯示<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>物件使用數個不同的文化特性的自訂格式字串。
